title: codcut | Tailored Digital Solutions
description: Delivering tailored IT solutions including web and mobile app development, API engineering, secure payment integrations, dynamic eCommerce platforms, Adobe Experience Manager expertise, full-stack development, agile project execution, CMS configurations, and immersive UI/UX design.
headline: Elite digital consulting and services
contact_1: Interested in working together? Awesome! Fill the above form with your name, email, and some details about your project. The more you can share, the better I can tailor my services to fit your needs.
contact_2: Have an app idea? or want to expand your business online? Let's talk!
about_meta_1: I focus on building robust and scalable web solutions, ensuring a balance between a seamless backend and an intuitive frontend. My approach prioritizes performance and user experience, integrating modern technologies to create dynamic, full-stack applications.
about_meta_2: Specializing in Adobe AEM, I tailor digital experiences to your unique needs. From custom components to user-friendly interfaces, my goal is to create dynamic content management systems that are both efficient and engaging.
about_meta_3: With a knack for seamless integration, I develop custom APIs that bridge your services with the digital world. Whether it's connecting with third-party platforms or enhancing internal communication, my APIs are designed for reliability and flexibility.
about_meta_4: Bringing life to the user interface, my expertise lies in crafting responsive and dynamic frontend designs. Utilising various libraries and frameworks, I ensure a seamless and engaging user experience, tailored to meet the unique needs of each project.
name: Name
subject: Subject
hero_4: From ideation to launch, I provide end-to-end web development services to elevate your brand's online presence.

buktio.title: Buktio
buktio.description: A comprehensive platform I crafted from the ground up, encompassing backend, frontend, and design.
features: Write Books: Draft open-source or private books, opening the avenue for community contributions. Each contribution, however, needs the nod from the book's author or a designated moderator.
Alternative Continuations: Got a twist for an existing tale? Spin off an alternate continuation from any segment of an open-source book, harnessing the power of content fragments.

Premium Book Creation: Step up as a premium author and monetize your masterpieces. Be mindful, this perk's availability varies by country. With each like or view from premium readers, you pocket a monthly sum.
Premium User Subscription: Dive deep into all premium books with a monthly/yearly subscription. Plus, your commitment directly fuels the passion of premium authors.
Co-Authorship: Dive into open-source books with your additions. Earn the co-author badge once your inputs gain approval.
Engage in Reading: Immerse yourself in the vast sea of content. Curate a reading list and relish the treasures penned by the community.

skyhavoc.title: Skyhavoc
skyhavoc.description: Immerse yourself in an expansive MMO Browser Game set against the awe-inspiring canvas of space. Built from the ground up by yours truly, it offers a unique twist to the space-themed gaming genre.
features: Space Exploration: Embark on your cosmic journey with a lone planet under your dominion. Navigate the vastness of space, encountering fellow players, mysterious solar systems, and distant galaxies. Your quest? Unravel the universe's secrets and stake your claim among the stars.

Forge Alliances: As you traverse the cosmos, the option to band together beckons. Join an existing alliance or establish your own. Alliances herald the advent of colossal ships, empowering members to explore galaxies with renewed vigor.
Planetary Progression: Your home planet is the cornerstone of your space saga. Invest time and resources to upgrade it, bolstering your position in the intergalactic hierarchy.

A Fresh Perspective: While Skyhavoc might echo familiar themes found in other space MMOs, its essence is distinct. For starters, your knowledge of the universe is initially limited to a single, randomly assigned solar system within an enigmatic galaxy. Unlike conventional games where the solar system's entirety is laid bare from the get-go, Skyhavoc cloaks other players in mystery. This design choice amplifies the thrill of discovery, pushing players to venture beyond the known and embrace the new.

babinio.title: Babinio
babinio.description: A meticulously crafted mobile app designed for proactive parents keen on staying attuned to their baby's daily routines.
features: Holistic Baby Monitoring: With Babinio at your fingertips, gain a panoramic view of your baby's day-to-day activities. From meal times and nap sessions to spirited playtimes and wellness checks, it's all encapsulated in one intuitive interface.
Diverse Activity Logging: Keep tabs on an array of activities: eating, sleeping, exercising, playing, health, crying, bathing, massage.

Historical Insight: Retrace your baby's activities with a comprehensive history feature. Whether you're reminiscing about a specific day, reviewing a week's patterns, or analyzing monthly milestones, Babinio's got you covered. An invaluable tool for pediatrician appointments or discussions with caregivers.

covermy.title: CoverMy
covermy.description: An innovative platform I've sculpted from scratch, with every layer—from backend and frontend to design—painstakingly devised by yours truly.
features: The CoverMy Philosophy: Traditional insurance feels like a relic. It's cumbersome, fragmented, and, frankly, outdated. Enter CoverMy—revolutionizing the insurance landscape. With state-of-the-art systems, we streamline the quoting process, granting users the power to engage with a multitude of insurance providers, all under the CoverMy umbrella.

Pricing Structure: We champion transparency. While CoverMy is a free gateway for consumers, our revenues stem from insurance providers. And here's the deal-breaker—irrespective of your policy choice or provider preference, there's zero bias on our end.

Our Insurance Spectrum: Request a quote and watch the magic unfold. Your data is dispatched to a battalion of insurance brokers. They meticulously evaluate your details, gauging the associated risk, and revert with fitting coverage. Their arsenal? Thousands of policies.
Diverse Insurance Coverage: CoverMy is your one-stop-shop for all general insurance needs. From third-party car insurance to intricate business coverage—CoverMy ensures you're shielded.

Insights: CoverMy is synonymous with effortless insurance. We're not here to compare or provide insurance. Our mission? Facilitate seamless interactions with insurance brokers, from procuring quotes and broker communications to document management and policy expiration reminders. Our content is purely factual. The onus of financial advice rests with your broker. CoverMy remains neutral, neither assessing nor ranking quotes. Your broker provides personalized advice.

brokerfy.title: Brokerfy
brokerfy.description: An all-encompassing platform I meticulously built from scratch, backend, frontend and design. It stands as a testament to seamless connectivity between brokers and customers across varied domains.
features: Credit Services: Connect with seasoned brokers adept in the intricacies of credit services. From personal loans to credit cards, get guided to the ideal financial solution. Enjoy the perks of expert advice, access to a plethora of brokers, and competitive rates tailored to your fiscal aspirations.

Real Estate Services: Venturing into the real estate realm? Our brokers, with their local market acumen, are your go-to for property pursuits. Benefit from a vast network of real estate specialists, invaluable local insights, and services fine-tuned to your preferences.

Insurance Services: Secure your assets and dear ones through our wide-ranging insurance services. Whether it's home, auto, or life insurance, our brokers got your back. Relish the advantages of diverse insurance specialists, custom-fit services, and the peace of mind from comprehensive coverage.

For Brokers: Elevate your clientele and business trajectory by joining Brokerfy. Our subscription-based model offers brokers an opportunity to tap into a vast reservoir of customers actively seeking broker services. By subscribing, you gain premium access to our platform, ensuring enhanced visibility for your services. This, combined with our tailored marketing efforts and an array of efficient business tools, sets you on the path to growth and success.

bruker.title: Bruker
bruker.description: Contributed to Bruker Corporation's strategic migration to Adobe Experience Manager, facilitating a robust and scalable web presence. As part of the migration, I played a pivotal role in ensuring that the transition was seamless, optimizing user experience and backend functionality.
features: Component Development: Designed and implemented AEM components, both for configuration and user interface. Ensured that components were versatile and could adapt to the varied content needs of the Bruker site.
Servlet Creation: Developed servlets to handle specific backend requests, optimizing site performance and ensuring swift data retrieval and processing.
Service Implementation: Crafted services tailored to Bruker's specific needs, ensuring efficient data management and seamless integration with other systems.

OSGI Configuration: Leveraged the power of the OSGI framework to configure and manage application modules. This ensured that Bruker's AEM setup was modular, maintainable, and could easily adapt to future requirements.
SSO System with Keycloak: Designed and implemented a Single Sign-On (SSO) system using Keycloak, providing users with a unified authentication experience across multiple applications and platforms.
User Migration: Successfully migrated existing user data to the new SSO system, ensuring data integrity and a smooth transition for users, with minimal disruptions.

allianz.title: Allianz Group
allianz.description: Collaborated with Allianz, a global titan in the insurance and financial services sector. Leveraging the capabilities of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), I meticulously translated design visions into dynamic web components, ensuring a fluid and engaging user experience.
features: Component Development: Skillfully crafted AEM components, both configuration and user interface, to mirror the design specifications provided by Allianz.
Design Integration: Seamlessly integrated given design into AEM, ensuring that the final output was both aesthetically pleasing and functionally robust.
Responsive Design: Ensured that the developed components were responsive and adaptive across a range of devices, guaranteeing a consistent user experience.

virgin_media.title: Virgin Media
virgin_media.description: Collaborated with Virgin Media, a prominent telecommunications company, to amplify their online presence. Leveraging Adobe Experience Manager (AEM), I meticulously crafted dynamic web components and implemented backend functionalities that catered to the specific needs of the brand.
features: Component Development: Engineered AEM components for both configuration and user interface, aligning with Virgin Media's design and functional specifications.
Servlet and Service Implementation: Crafted servlets and services to handle specific backend functionalities, ensuring efficient data retrieval, processing, and integration within the AEM ecosystem.

Phone Collection Filter System: Designed and implemented an advanced filter system for a collection of phones stored within AEM, enhancing user experience and streamlining the product selection process.

boots.title: Boots
boots.description: I had the privilege of contributing to Boots, a renowned UK-based e-commerce platform. Undertaking roles in both the backend and frontend realms, I was pivotal in enhancing the platform's shopping experience and underlying infrastructures.
features: Backend API Development: Architected and optimized backend APIs, ensuring seamless data flow and robust functionalities to cater to the diverse needs of the e-commerce platform.
Microservices Management & Orchestration: Utilizing ExpressJS, I managed intricate microservices, orchestrating them to ensure streamlined operations and optimal performance.

Cart & Checkout System Enhancement: In the frontend domain, using React, I was instrumental in designing and implementing critical sections of a revamped cart and checkout system. This overhaul aimed to simplify the user journey, making product selection, review, and purchase a breeze.

sunstar_gum.title: Sunstar GUM
sunstar_gum.description: I collaborated with Sunstar GUM, where I used Adobe AEM to maintain and extend the existing code. I had the opportunity to create new components, develop servlets and services, and I also worked on the dispatcher section to extend the supported regions.
features: Code Maintenance: Ensured efficient maintenance of the existing code, addressing any issues or bugs that arose and optimizing overall performance.
New Component Creation: Based on the project's needs and specifications, I developed new components in Adobe AEM to enhance functionality and user experience.
Development of Servlets and Services: Designed and implemented new servlets and services to meet the platform's complex requirements.

Dispatcher Extension: Worked on the dispatcher section, ensuring that the platform could support and correctly serve content for additional regions, thus expanding the platform's coverage and accessibility.

webasto.title: Webasto
webasto.description: In my collaboration with Webasto, I heavily utilized Adobe AEM to craft components tailored to the project's requirements. While my efforts spanned both backend and frontend, the emphasis was decidedly on the frontend. I used React to implement intricate features such as a product finder, an exhaustive product catalog complete with filters, and a map interface to showcase Webasto agency locations.
features: Component Creation in AEM: Developed multiple components in AEM to bolster the site's functionality and improve user interactions.
Servlets Development: Crafted servlets tailored to the components, ensuring efficient data retrieval and processing.
React-based Frontend Development: Deployed React to construct dynamic frontend features
Product Finder: A tool to help users swiftly locate the products they desire.
Product Catalog: An interactive catalog, allowing users to peruse products and apply filters to narrow down their search.
Webasto Agency Map: Devised a map interface to visually represent and provide easy access to Webasto agency locations.
